channel.title: [508] In commands.java, comman which send message to all
channel.description:
hi guys i tryed multiple way's noone of them work.. i would be werry thanksfull if someone would help me figure out few lines of script which send message to all BASE: Palidino76 Example: [CODE] if (cmd[0].equals("berdy")) { p.frames.sendMessage(p, "<col=FF3300>[SERVER] Update by <img=1> 3mins"+Misc.optimizeText(p.username)); //shit doesnt work }[/CODE]
PLZ HELP ME OUT .. :S
